bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>ğŸ› Bug</denchmark-h>
The method run_n_episodes takes an environment as parameter, that should be used to run a specific number of episodes. But instead it uses the objects environment (self.env and not the parameter env) to run the simulation steps. This bug also causes warnings when testing the DQN model, as the passed environment is resetted, but the environment to run the simulation steps on is not reseted and thus may be in an invalid state (e.g. already finished). <denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>
The bug is caused by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/blob/413b9df0d615fb6dbfe0bdc00f905ab7c4aed07d/pl_bolts/models/rl/dqn_model.py#L175>line 175 in dqn_model.py</denchmark-link> .
